title: Rank Team Bronze vs Diamonds and Platinum
body: I'm not sure why but me and my bronze rank team player against diamonds and platinum rank team's. We once encountered a diamond+ team (1 challenger) but they were in their provisions. **What can i do for the team to work our way up the ladders?** cause were struggling to get out when we constantly encounter diamond+...

replies.body: Rank teams are quite something, you can expect a lot of unfair match-ups because each new team assumes you're all on the same skill level, which can be true. A bunch of platinum and diamond players might lose to a bronze team because the bronze team are on point in a team based situation. Most of the time this isn't the case but the only way to avoid it is for players to not make multiple teams and it's only the real way to avoid it without making a phantom mmr for ranked teams.

I think the ranked team match making system is wrong as well. Only last week my ranked team got matched against bronze and we completely destroyed the other team. We only had 2 deaths...thanks botlane...to their 30 something deaths. Definitely not a fair system.
